Name: Metagroove
About the game: Metagroove is a very unique 3d visualization tool for music. This first version is Alpha and it's a work in progress. Load your own music, add some parameters. Import your own custom 3d models or free models you find on the internet. Add background images, type your own text and watch what happens! Apply different animation and spawning parameters to see things move around. Useful for crypto artists, DJ's, streaming (starts, pauses, endings), memes, experiments, logos, visualizations, and more Features! Easy to use Works with audio streaming sources Import MP3's and .WAV's Import your own models or free models from the web, supports DAE, FBX, OBJ, STL, 3DS A large amount of built in 3d models Easily create stunning visuals for video or desktop wallpapers in a fraction of the time it takes to learn complex 3d programs Create your own memes Add weather, such as rain, clouds, snow Add lighting effects Add your own text or logos The music included is by Evan Gipson and Tineidae!
Meta Title: Metagroove: Nov 20, 2020, Josh Presseisen and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Metagroove? Check out the release date (Nov 20, 2020), developer insights from Josh Presseisen, and a complete game summary.
